when_to_seek_help: Accompanied by stiff neck, confusion, or severe headache
With difficulty breathing or chest pain
In infants under 3 months with any fever
self_care: Cool compresses on forehead and wrists
Light clothing and comfortable room temperature

headache.description: Pain in any region of the head, ranging from sharp to dull

types.tension_headache: Mild to moderate constant band-like pain around head
types.migraine: Moderate to severe throbbing pain, often with nausea and light sensitivity
types.cluster_headache: Severe burning or piercing pain around one eye
types.sinus_headache: Deep constant pain in cheekbones, forehead, or bridge of nose

red_flags: Headache with fever, stiff neck, or confusion
Headache with vision changes, weakness, or numbness
Headache that worsens with coughing or movement

management.tension: Rest, stress reduction, OTC pain relievers
